data.name: Heart of Dungeon
data.detailed_description:
You are an adventurer.
You are on a journey to King's Landing and are now escorting a merchant's wagon.
Your companion, a competitor, has told you of a dungeon in the area.
You may head there, or you may not.
The choice is yours.

It's a dungeon RPG game in gamebook format.
You will fight against the monsters you meet in the dungeon and you will grow up.
You will be able to conquer this dreadful dungeon.

But sometimes you lose.
Sometimes there are unwanted consequences....

data.short_description: You are an adventurer. You are on a journey to King's Landing and are now escorting a merchant's wagon. Your companion, a competitor, has told you of a dungeon in the area. You may head there, or you may not. The choice is yours.
data.supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, French, Italian, German, Greek, Swedish, Czech, Danish, Hungarian, Finnish, Bulgarian, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Polish, Romanian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work . The game contains Nudity or Sexual Content, Frequent Violence, sexual assault, non-consensual sex, general Mature Content.
All characters are over the age of 18.
